subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Kansas City Coach Todd Haley, in the process of rebuilding the Chiefs, is trying to manage expectations for a team that is improbably the last remaining unbeaten club in the N.F.L.
snippet: Kansas City Coach Todd Haley, in the process of rebuilding the Chiefs, is trying to manage expectations for a team that is improbably the last remaining unbeaten club in the N.F.L.
